statements: SELECT * FROM flight_schedule WHERE departure_airport = 'JFK';
SELECT flight_id, flight_name, price FROM flight_schedule WHERE price <= 500.00;
SELECT * FROM flight_schedule WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT flight_id, flight_name, departure_airport, arrival_airport, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flight_schedule WHERE available_seats > 50;
SELECT flight_id, flight_name, arrival_airport, price FROM flight_schedule WHERE arrival_time < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM flight_schedule WHERE departure_airport = 'JFK' AND available_seats > 50 ORDER BY departure_time DESC
SELECT flight_name, departure_airport, arrival_airport, price FROM flight_schedule WHERE price < 500 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT flight_name, departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM flight_schedule WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-12-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY arrival_time
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM flight_schedule WHERE departure_airport = 'LAX'
SELECT DISTINCT departure_airport, COUNT(*) AS flight_count FROM flight_schedule GROUP BY departure_airport HAVING flight_count > 2 ORDER BY flight_count DESC
SELECT * FROM FlightSchedules WHERE flight_id = 101;
SELECT flight_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM FlightSchedules WHERE available_seats > 50;
SELECT flight_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM FlightSchedules WHERE departure_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT flight_name, price FROM FlightSchedules JOIN Pricing ON FlightSchedules.flight_id = Pricing.flight_id WHERE price < 500.00;
SELECT * FROM Pricing WHERE ticket_type = 'Business' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT flight_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM FlightSchedules
SELECT flight_name, available_seats FROM FlightSchedules WHERE available_seats > 50
SELECT flight_name, departure_time, arrival_time, price FROM FlightSchedules JOIN Pricing ON FlightSchedules.flight_id = Pricing.flight_id
SELECT flight_name, departure_time, arrival_time, price FROM FlightSchedules LEFT JOIN Pricing ON FlightSchedules.flight_id = Pricing.flight_id
SELECT * FROM FlightSchedules WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-08-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-08-31 23:59:59'
SELECT * FROM flight_schedules ORDER BY departure_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT flight_id, airline, departure_location FROM flight_schedules WHERE departure_location = 'New York'
SELECT airline, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flight_schedules WHERE airline = 'Delta Airlines' AND arrival_location = 'Paris'
SELECT flight_id, arrival_location, departure_location FROM flight_schedules WHERE arrival_time BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30'
SELECT flight_id, departure_time, arrival_time, departure_location, arrival_location FROM flight_schedules WHERE departure_location IN ('London', 'Madrid')
SELECT * FROM flight_schedules;
SELECT flight_id, airline, departure_location, arrival_location FROM flight_schedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01 10:00:00';
SELECT flight_id, airline, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flight_schedules ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT flight_id, airline, departure_location, arrival_location, price, currency FROM flight_schedules LEFT JOIN pricing ON flight_schedules.flight_id = pricing.flight_id;

SELECT flight_id, airline, departure_location, arrival_location, available_seats, booked_seats, min_seats_for_booking FROM flight_schedules JOIN availability ON flight_schedules.flight_id = availability.flight_id WHERE availability.available_seats > 0;
SELECT * FROM FlightSchedules;
SELECT flight_id, flight_number, departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM FlightSchedules ORDER BY flight_number DESC;
SELECT departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM FlightSchedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT pricing_id, flight_id, ticket_type, price FROM Pricing WHERE price < 500.00 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, flight_id, date, ticket_type FROM Reservations WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FlightSchedules;
SELECT flight_id, flight_number, departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM FlightSchedules WHERE departure_airport = 'JFK';
SELECT flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM FlightSchedules ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT pricing.pricing_id, pricing.ticket_type, pricing.price, FlightSchedules.departure_airport FROM Pricing INNER JOIN FlightSchedules ON Pricing.flight_id = FlightSchedules.flight_id;

SELECT Reservations.customer_name, FlightSchedules.departure_airport, Availability.date, Availability.available_seats FROM Reservations INNER JOIN FlightSchedules ON Reservations.flight_id = FlightSchedules.flight_id INNER JOIN Availability ON Reservations.flight_id = Availability.flight_id WHERE Reservations.date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM flights
SELECT flight_number, departure_city, arrival_city FROM flights
SELECT flight_id, departure_time, arrival_time, price FROM flights
SELECT * FROM airlines
SELECT airline_name FROM airlines
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_city = 'New York';
SELECT flight_number, departure_city, arrival_city FROM flights WHERE price >= 500 ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT airlines.airline_name, COUNT(*) AS total_flights FROM flights JOIN airlines ON flights.flight_id = airlines.airline_id GROUP BY airlines.airline_name HAVING total_flights > 10;
SELECT airport_code, airport_name, city FROM airports WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' OR city = 'Chicago';

SELECT passengers.first_name, passengers.last_name, flights.flight_number, reservations.reservation_date FROM passengers JOIN reservations ON passengers.passenger_id = reservations.passenger_id JOIN flights ON reservations.flight_id = flights.flight_id WHERE passengers.email LIKE '%gmail.com';
